details: SLORegistry is a contract for handling creation of service level objectives and querying those service level objectives

SLOCreated(address).details: event for service level objective creation logging

params.slo: The address of the created service level objective contract

createSLO(uint256,uint8,bytes32).details: public function for creating service level objectives

params._name: name of the service level objective in bytes32

userSLOs(address).details: public view function that returns the service level objectives that the given user has created

params._user: Address of the user for which to return the service level objectives

title: SLORegistry
